Text: My name is Lauren.  Can I have your name?
I did.  Do you need the customer number?
And the year making model of your vehicle?
Can I have you verify your address and phone number, please?
That's an RMUTA 84097.  And my phone number is 801-431-1000.
I located your information.  The newest version we have available for your vehicle is version 7.7, which was released  in March of 2012.
Well, can we wait just a second?
It looks as though you have an updated your vehicle for three years.  So that would be the equivalent of getting three years' worth of updates for the price of one.
I would definitely recommend taking advantage of the extra $50 off before it expires.
